snippet.title: Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley - Fuddler's Courtship | DLC & Console Announcement! | Wishlist ❤️
snippet.description:
A new heartfelt novella-like story of romance for Snufkin: Melody of Moominvalley - Fuddler’s Courtship, coming soon to PC and Consoles! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2875880/Snufkin_Melody_of_Moominvalley__Fuddlers_Courtship/

Join Snufkin and his best friend, Moomintroll, as they embark on a camping trip deep into the wilds before winter sets in. What should have been a relaxing excursion for two, turns into a chaotic and romantic journey, with many new and old friends. 

Coming soon to Nintendo Switch, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Steam and Windows!
Join our adventures and stay up to date on social media:

Our newsletter - https://www.snufkin.game/
Bluesky - https://bsky.app/profile/hypergames.no
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/hyper.games.studio/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/hyper.games.studio/
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@hyper.games.studio
Discord - https://discord.com/invite/tbV9MHkwta
X - https://twitter.com/hypergames

Find out more about Moomin:
Web: moomin.com
Instagram: @moominofficial
TikTok: @moominofficial
YouTube: @Moominofficial

© SNUFKIN: MELODY OF MOOMINVALLEY. Developed by Hyper Games. Published by Raw Fury AB. © Moomin Characters ™
